insert into device_slot ( id, slot_code, `name`, device_id, created_at, created_by ) values ( null, #{device.slotCode}, #{device.slotName}, ( select t.id from device t inner join ( select id from alarm_center.`position` t1 where position_code = #{device.LineCode} and type = 1 and exists ( select id from alarm_center.`position` t2 where position_code = #{device.stationCode} and type = 3 and t1.p_id = t2.id) ) as t1 on t.position_id = t1.id inner join ( select id from alarm_center.subsystem where sid = #{device.systemCode} ) as t2 on t.system_id = t2.id where t.device_code = #{device.deviceCode} ), NOW(), #{userId} ); select @@IDENTITY as id;
